gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD
Class TableViewComponent

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.TableViewComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewComponent, IViewComponent2D
public class TableViewComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IViewComponent2D, IPreserveState

The TableViewComponent is used to display data in a table. Currently, this the tables will only display rectangular arrays, ragged arrays must be put into a rectangular array.

Constructor Detail

TableViewComponent

public TableViewComponent(IVirtualArray2D array)
Constructor - Data is passed in the form of an IVirtualArray2D to be display by this component in a table. To view 1D or 3D data with the TableViewComponent, define the data as an IVirtualArray2D.

Note: All IVirtualArray2D data is assumed to be rectangular. If ragged 1D data is put into an IVirtualArray2D, be sure to "rectangularize" the data.

Parameters:
array - Array of data wrapped in an IVirtualArray2D.

setPointedAt

public void setPointedAt(floatPoint2D fpt)
This method is a notification to the view component that the selected point (cell) has changed. This assumes that fpt is in world coordinates.

Specified by:
setPointedAt in interface IViewComponent2D
Parameters:
fpt - - current cell specified in (x,y) world coordinates.

getPointedAt

public floatPoint2D getPointedAt()
Get the current pointed-at cell. The pointed-at cell has a highlighted border. The current cell is specified by a floatPoint2D in world coordinates.

Specified by:
getPointedAt in interface IViewComponent2D
Returns:
The current point in world coordinates.

setSelectedRegions

public void setSelectedRegions(Region[] rgn)
Given an array of points, a selection overlay can be created.

Specified by:
setSelectedRegions in interface IViewComponent2D
Parameters:
rgn - - array of regions

getSelectedRegions

public Region[] getSelectedRegions()
Retrieve array of regions generated by the selection overlay. If none of the TableRegions are deselected, a list of TableRegions is returned. If a deselected TableRegion exists, a single PointRegion containing a list of selected cells will be returned in the array.

Specified by:
getSelectedRegions in interface IViewComponent2D
Returns:
The selected regions, either a list of TableRegions or a single PointRegion.

dataChanged

public void dataChanged()
This method is invoked to notify the view component when the data has changed within the same array.

Specified by:
dataChanged in interface IViewComponent

dataChanged

public void dataChanged(IVirtualArray2D array)
This method is invoked to notify the view component when a new set of data needs to be displayed.

Specified by:
dataChanged in interface IViewComponent2D
Parameters:
array - - virtual array of data

kill

public void kill()
This method is called by the viewer to inform the view component it is no longer needed. In turn, the view component closes all windows created by it before closing.

Specified by:
kill in interface IViewComponent

getColumnRowAtPixel

public java.awt.Point getColumnRowAtPixel(java.awt.Point pixel_pt)
Get the (x = column, y = row) "image coordinate" point of the image at the "pixel coordinate" point given. This method will map pixel values to image column/row values.

Parameters:
pixel_pt - The pixel value (x=row,y=column) of the image.
Returns:
The "Image Coordinate" value of pixel_pt.

getColumnRowAtWorldCoords

public java.awt.Point getColumnRowAtWorldCoords(floatPoint2D wc_pt)
Get the (x = column, y = row) "image coordinate" point of the image at the "world coordinate" point given. This method will map world coordinate values (defined by AxisInfo) to image column/row values.

Parameters:
wc_pt - The world coordinate value (x-axis,y-axis) of the image.
Returns:
The "Image Coordinate" value of wc_pt.

getWorldCoordsAtPixel

public floatPoint2D getWorldCoordsAtPixel(java.awt.Point pixel_pt)
Get the (x-axis, y-axis) "world coordinate" point of the image at the "pixel coordinate" point given. This method will map pixel values to world coordinate x-axis/y-axis values.

Parameters:
pixel_pt - The pixel value (x=row,y=column) of the image.
Returns:
The "World Coordinate" value of pixel_pt.

getWorldCoordsAtColumnRow

public floatPoint2D getWorldCoordsAtColumnRow(java.awt.Point col_row_pt)
Get the (x-axis,y-axis) "world coordinate" value of the (x = column, y = row) "image coordinate" point given. This method will map image column/row values to world coordinate values (defined by AxisInfo).

Parameters:
col_row_pt - The image coordinate value (column,row) of the image.
Returns:
The "World Coordinate" point of col_row_pt.
